name: Lightforce Ninja - DEMO
description:
WARNING: VERY HARD GAME!

Story:

A red cyber-virus affects the whole planet. 

As "RD" the lightforce ninja you have to stop it! Use his lightforce-cyber-arm to navigate through dangerous environment. You have to reach the control center of the cyber-virus to save the planet from certain death!

Description:

This is the demo version of a game I am currently working on. The objective is simple: Just reach the end of each level. The execution however can be very hard. I was inspired by games like "Jump King" or "Getting Over It" ... just so you know what you are getting yourself into. 

The game will have  6 different worlds with 2 levels each. In this demo version you get to play the first world (which is also the easiest). Each world will have it's special obstacles and challenges.

The only way to lose in this game is to give up. It can be very frustrating and punishing but that's fun... right?

Info:

The game is still under development. I expect the final version to be finished in 1-2 months. Bug reports are welcome!

Have fun and let me know what you think! Also let me know if you managed to beat the 2 levels!
